text: Props to <@U012W4YEUTX> for stepping up big time in the <#C2YHAHB6K|api> channel! Love the clarifying questions and helpful directions.
Thank you to <@UDHT6N5SM> for starting an <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1594682915282200|epic thread> on performance optimization on HubSpot, and giving lots of feedback.
